column18: 05/12/2015: Assailants attacked the car of journalist Zorica Bulatovic in Kolasin town, Kolasin municipality, Montenegro. Bulatovic was not harmed in the attack, but her car was damaged. No group claimed responsibility for the incident.
column64: The specific motive is unknown; however, sources posited that the victim was targeted due to her work as a journalist.
column108: A vehicle was damaged in this attack.
column125: There is doubt that this incident meets terrorism-related criteria. The attack may have been related to the victim's journalistic work regarding controversial practices of local companies.
column126: \\"\"Attack on journalist's car seen as act of intimidation"
